content.text: Match ends, Watford 0, Manchester City 6.
Second Half ends, Watford 0, Manchester City 6.
Foul by Raheem Sterling (Manchester City).
José Holebas (Watford) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Attempt saved. Sergio Agüero (Manchester City) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the top right corner. Assisted by Raheem Sterling.
Attempt blocked. Ilkay Gündogan (Manchester City) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Benjamin Mendy.
Foul by John Stones (Manchester City).
Troy Deeney (Watford) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Goal!  Watford 0, Manchester City 6. Raheem Sterling (Manchester City) converts the penalty with a right footed shot to the top left corner.
Penalty Manchester City. Raheem Sterling draws a foul in the penalty area.
Penalty conceded by Christian Kabasele (Watford) after a foul in the penalty area.
Attempt missed. Raheem Sterling (Manchester City) left footed shot from outside the box is close, but misses to the right. Assisted by Bernardo Silva.
Leroy Sané (Manchester City) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by Richarlison (Watford).
Attempt blocked. Leroy Sané (Manchester City) left footed shot from the centre of the box is blocked.
Goal!  Watford 0, Manchester City 5. Sergio Agüero (Manchester City) right footed shot from a difficult angle on the right to the bottom left corner. Assisted by Kyle Walker.
Attempt missed. Leroy Sané (Manchester City) left footed shot from the left side of the box is close, but misses to the left. Assisted by Ilkay Gündogan.
Corner,  Manchester City. Conceded by Daryl Janmaat.
Substitution, Manchester City. Leroy Sané replaces David Silva.
Delay over. They are ready to continue.
Delay in match Christian Kabasele (Watford) because of an injury.
Attempt missed. Raheem Sterling (Manchester City) right footed shot from the centre of the box misses to the left. Assisted by Sergio Agüero.
Substitution, Watford. Troy Deeney replaces Andre Gray.
Attempt missed. Etienne Capoue (Watford) header from very close range is close, but misses the top left corner. Assisted by Richarlison with a headed pass following a corner.
Corner,  Watford. Conceded by Bernardo Silva.
Richarlison (Watford) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Foul by Kyle Walker (Manchester City).
Substitution, Watford. Etienne Capoue replaces Nathaniel Chalobah.
Substitution, Manchester City. Ilkay Gündogan replaces Kevin De Bruyne.
Corner,  Manchester City. Conceded by Adrian Mariappa.
Substitution, Manchester City. Bernardo Silva replaces Gabriel Jesus.
Substitution, Watford. Roberto Pereyra replaces Tom Cleverley.
Goal!  Watford 0, Manchester City 4. Nicolás Otamendi (Manchester City) header from the centre of the box to the top right corner. Assisted by David Silva with a cross following a corner.
Corner,  Manchester City. Conceded by Heurelho Gomes.

Attempt missed. Sergio Agüero (Manchester City) right footed shot from the centre of the box misses to the right. Assisted by Benjamin Mendy with a cross.
Attempt blocked. Gabriel Jesus (Manchester City) right footed shot from the left side of the box is blocked. Assisted by Raheem Sterling.
Offside, Watford. Richarlison tries a through ball, but Andre Gray is caught offside.
Attempt missed. Sergio Agüero (Manchester City) right footed shot from outside the box misses to the right. Assisted by Benjamin Mendy.
